import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import MyImageFolder from 'http://localhost:3000/Users/davidazzato/Desktop/Tesi/Capitolo%202/NFT_Ds/imgs/' const Nft = ({nft}) => { const { category, coco_url, collection, date_captured, file_name, file_path, flickr_url, generated_caption, height, id, license, original_caption, similarity, width } = nft file_path_updated = MyImageFolder + file_name return (

{file_path}

{collection}

{generated_caption}

{original_caption}

Details
) } export default Nft
